title: Community Acquired Pneumonia in Telemark and Ostfold
text:
Summary: The aim of the study is to investigate the bacterial causes in community acquired pneumonia in adults admitted to hospital in two counties in Norway and to look at possible factors that makes the patients susceptible to pneumonia.
Inclusion criteria: inclusion criteria: 

 Symptoms of lower airway infection and radiologic sings of pneumonia. 

 
Exclusion criteria: : 

 Age<18 

 Serious psychiatric illness 

 Mentally retarded 

 Hospitalized last 14 days
